I'm back from my camping trip, everyone. I've just read 300 emails 
while talking to alot of people, so I might be confused on some 
things. Please forgive me if I am, I'm still burned from camping.

Also, KSLawdogg has given me controll of all his Maximal and Alliance 
characters until he returns (if anyone wants, I can forward his 
email).

::Zardus/Nemesis Enforcer/Hiss/Breakdown/Scattershot/Punch::

With a flash, Zardus apears in the forest, falling to his knees, 
panting. He gets up, looking around.

"Nemesis," he says into his comm-link, "What's the situation?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss grins, taking a step forward.

"I think I will!" he snarls at Iron Raptor, walking up to the bars, 
his gun aimed at her, "You foolish raptor you will never escape and 
we will destroy your maximal," he says, not realizing the danger he's 
in.

"Hiss, back away. She might get dumb and start biting," Breakdown 
orders, the rest of the Oblitercons holding their guns ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nemesis Enforcer looks up as he recieves Zardus' transmission.

"The Maximals threatened to attack, Zardus," he replies, "But we told 
them that we'll kill the Maximals if they d-"

The scanner beeps, reporting an object hitting the shields, and 
interrupting Nemesis. Nemesis looks down at the scanners and swears, 
then nearly cracks up laughting

"The Maximals threw someone into our shields, Zardus!" he says into 
his comm-link, "I think their logic circuits are burned!"

"I see," Zardus' voice replies, "Try not to kill the females unless 
necessary, I have use for them. I will go deal with Panzertron."

Nemesis Enforcer turns around, deactivating the comm-link. "You heard 
him!" he says to the Alliance members there, "Scattershot, Punch, get 
to the brig. Tell Dark One and his gang to get out there and kill 
someone. You two stay and guard the prisoners."

Punch and Scattershot nod, setting off toward the brig.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus turns around, continuing toward Panzertron's ship.

"Delta, could you meet me at my location," he says into his comm-
link, "And bring the cloaking device with you."
